column4: What's a nice, easy VPN program to use? I need to connect to the VPN at my uni which appears to be using pptp, but I can't figure out how the _heck_ one uses pptp.
kvpn doesn't work, and doesn't give any info as to why it isn't working either.
I used poptop once, but that was years ago.... was easy enough to set up though
domain name, sure.. fixed IP's can be a pain some places though
assuming you can get source for any of the popular windows programs...?
